statements: SELECT * FROM digital_badges;
SELECT badge_name, user_name, earned_date FROM digital_badges;
SELECT user_id, user_name, earned_date FROM digital_badges WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM digital_badges WHERE earned_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT badge_name, user_name FROM digital_badges ORDER BY badge_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_badges WHERE badge_id = 1 AND user_id = 10 ORDER BY earned_date DESC, badge_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, COUNT(badge_id) AS badge_count FROM digital_badges GROUP BY user_id, user_name HAVING COUNT(badge_id) > 3 ORDER BY badge_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT badge_id, badge_name FROM digital_badges WHERE earned_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY badge_name;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(DISTINCT badge_id) AS unique_badges FROM digital_badges GROUP BY user_name ORDER BY unique_badges DESC, user_name;
SELECT badge_name, user_name, earned_date FROM digital_badges WHERE user_id IN (5, 10, 15) AND badge_name LIKE '%Expert%' ORDER BY badge_name ASC, earned_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM badges;
SELECT badge_name, badge_description FROM badges WHERE earned_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT badge_id, badge_name FROM badges ORDER BY badge_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_badges WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, badge_id, earned_date FROM user_badges ORDER BY earned_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM badges WHERE badge_id = 1;
SELECT badge_name, earned_date FROM badges ORDER BY badge_id DESC;
SELECT MIN(badge_id), MAX(badge_id) FROM badges;
SELECT badge_name, COUNT(*) AS total_badges FROM badges GROUP BY badge_name;
SELECT badge_name, badge_description FROM badges WHERE earned_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM digital_badges
SELECT badge_name, user_id FROM digital_badges ORDER BY badge_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM digital_badges
SELECT certification_name, date_earned FROM certifications WHERE expiry_date IS NULL
SELECT user_id, skill_name, proficiency_level FROM user_skills
SELECT badge_id, badge_name, user_id, date_earned FROM digital_badges WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT certification_name, user_id, date_earned, expiry_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_id > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_skills WHERE skill_name = 'Python' ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, skill_name, proficiency_level FROM user_skills WHERE proficiency_level > 3 AND proficiency_level < 6 ORDER BY skill_name ASC;
SELECT badge_id, badge_name, user_id, date_earned FROM digital_badges WHERE date_earned < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_earned DESC, badge_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM badges;
SELECT badge_id, badge_name FROM badges WHERE earned_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT cert_id, cert_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, cert_id, completion_date FROM user_certifications WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT badge_name, earned_date FROM badges WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, cert_name, completion_date FROM user_certifications WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM digital_badges WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT badge_name, issue_date FROM digital_badges WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE join_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT cert_name FROM certifications WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, skill_id, proficiency_level FROM user_skills WHERE proficiency_level > 3;
SELECT badge_name, issue_date FROM digital_badges;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT cert_name, issue_date FROM certifications ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT skill_name FROM skills WHERE skill_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT user_id, skill_id, proficiency_level FROM user_skills WHERE proficiency_level > 3;
